abstract_summ: The references list of the key studies was reviewed for additional relevant resources.There were few controlled studies, and control for confounding was inadequate in observational studies.RESULTS: After a review of 175 citations, we included 5 clinical trials (total of 345 patients), 9 observational studies (n = 2529), and 6 additional studies (n = 775) reporting on the QT interval.Results: Seven studies including four clinical trials and three observational studies have entered into the study.DATA SYNTHESIS Four randomized controlled trials, 10 cohort studies, and 9 case series assessed treatment effects of the medications, but no studies evaluated prophylaxis.
title_summ: A Systematic Review and Meta-regression AnalysisOcular toxicity and Hydroxychloroquine: A Rapid Meta-AnalysisSystematic Review and Meta-analysis of the Effectiveness and Safety of Hydroxychloroquine in COVID-19.Chloroquine and Hydroxychloroquine for the treatment of COVID-19: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysisHydroxychloroquine and mortality risk of patients with COVID-19: a systematic review and meta-analysis of human comparative studiesHydroxychloroquine plus standard care compared with the standard care alone in COVID-19: a meta-analysis of randomized controlled trialsBenefits and Risks of Chloroquine and Hydroxychloroquine in The Treatment of Viral Diseases: A Meta-Analysis of Placebo Randomized Controlled TrialsChloroquine and hydroxychloroquine effectiveness in human subjects during coronavirus: a systematic reviewHydroxychloroquine Versus COVID-19: A Rapid Systematic Review and Meta-AnalysisDoes Adding of Hydroxychloroquine to the Standard Care Provide any Benefit in Reducing the Mortality among COVID-19 Patients?: a Systematic ReviewVirological and clinical cure in COVID‐19 patients treated with hydroxychloroquine: A systematic review and meta‐analysisAssessment of Hydroxychloroquine and Chloroquine Safety Profiles: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis“Hydroxychloroquine in patients with COVID-19: A Systematic Review and meta-analysis.”Clinical evidence for repurposing chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine as antiviral agents: a systematic reviewUpdate I. A systematic review on the efficacy and safety of chloroquine/hydroxychloroquine for COVID-19Hydroxychloroquine effects on psoriasis: a systematic review and a cautionary note for COVID-19 treatmentAre hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine effective in the treatment of SARS-COV-2 (COVID-19)?Hydroxychloroquine safety: A meta-analysis of randomized controlled trialsEfficacy and Safety of Hydroxychloroquine and Chloroquine for COVID-19: A systematic reviewHydroxychloroquine in COVID-19: A systematic review and meta-analysisThe Cardiac Toxicity of Chloroquine or Hydroxychloroquine in COVID-19 Patients:Efficacy of a high-dose antiresorptive drug holiday to reduce the risk of medication-related osteonecrosis of the jaw (MRONJ): A systematic review.Effectiveness and Safety of High Dose Tigecycline for the Treatment of Severe Infections: A Systematic Review and Meta-AnalysisHydroxychloroquine or Chloroquine for Treatment or Prophylaxis of COVID-19: A Living Systematic Review.Adverse drug reactions associated with amitriptyline - protocol for a systematic multiple-indication review and meta-analysis.
